attributes.action: Request a Judicial Review of Gavin Williamson knighthood
attributes.additional_details: A fair justification of the reason the knighthood was given.
attributes.background: The knighthood of Gavin Williamson appears to be totally un merited and if so calls into disrepute the honours system as a whole.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed, or the decision to award an honour to be subject to judicial review.
